# Load data

Load accessibility data
```{r load_data, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
acc_dt <- lapply(opts$acc.annos, function(n) {
  fread(
    file = sprintf("%s/%s.tsv.gz",io$acc_data_parsed,n),
    showProgress = F, header = F,
    select = c("V1"="factor","V2"="character","V3"="factor","V4"="integer","V5"="integer","V6"="integer")
    ) %>% .[V1%in%sample_metadata$id_acc] %>% droplevels
}) %>% rbindlist %>% setnames(c("id_acc","id","anno","Nmet","Ntotal","rate"))
```

Load results from the differential analysis
```{r}
diff.acc <- lapply(opts$acc.annos, function(x)
  fread(sprintf("%s/ICM_vs_TE_mural_%s.txt.gz",io$diff.acc,x)) %>% .[,anno:=as.factor(x)]
) %>% rbindlist %>%
  .[abs(diff)>opts$min.acc.diff & padj_fdr<=opts$fdr.threshold] %>%
  .[,c("id","anno","diff","padj_fdr")]
```

```{r}
diff.acc[,direction:=factor(diff>0)]
levels(diff.acc$direction) <- c("High ICM","High TE")
diff.acc[,.N,by=c("direction","anno")]
```

# Parse data

Merge data with metadata
```{r merge}
acc_dt <- acc_dt %>% merge(sample_metadata[,c("id_acc","lineage","stage")], by="id_acc")
```

Subset data using the significant hits
```{r}
acc_dt.diff <- acc_dt %>% merge(diff.acc, by=c("id","anno"))
acc_dt.nodiff <- acc_dt[!id%in%acc_dt.diff$id] %>% .[,direction:="NA"]
```

# Plot

```{r}
to.plot <- acc_dt.diff %>%
  .[,.(
    rate = 100*(sum(Nmet)/sum(Ntotal)), 
    Nmet = sum(Nmet), 
    Ntotal = sum(Ntotal)
  ), by=c("id_acc","lineage","anno","direction")]

# %>% .[,anno:=stringr::str_replace_all(anno,opts$acc.annos)]
  # .[,stage_lineage:=factor(stage_lineage, levels=names(colors))]
```

Boxplots with accessibility rate per genomic context and lineage
```{r}
for (i in unique(to.plot$anno)) {
  p <- ggplot(to.plot[anno==i], aes(x=lineage, y=rate)) +
    geom_boxplot(outlier.shape=NA, coef=1) +
    # geom_boxplot(aes(fill=stage_lineage), outlier.shape=NA, coef=1) +
    # scale_fill_manual(values=colors) +
    labs(x="", y="accessibility (%)") +
    facet_wrap(~anno+direction, ncol=2, scales="fixed") +
    # coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0,40)) +
    theme_bw() +
    # guides(color=F, fill=F) +
    # theme_pb() +
    theme(
      # strip.background = element_rect(fill="#F37A71"),
      axis.text.x = element_text(size=rel(1.0), color="black", angle=40, vjust=1, hjust=1),
      # axis.text.y = element_text(size=rel(1.2), color="black"),
      # axis.title.y = element_text(size=rel(1.4), color="black"),
      # strip.background = element_rect(fill="#F37A71"),
      # strip.text = element_text(size=rel(1.8), color="black"),
      # legend.position="top",
      # legend.title = element_blank()
    )
  
  pdf(sprintf("%s/boxplots_acc_%s.pdf",io$outdir,i), width=7, height=5)
  print(p)
  dev.off()
}
```
